member.name: IWICFormatConverterInfo.CreateInstance
member.param: A pointer that receives a new instance.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICFormatConverterInfo.GetPixelFormats
member.summary: Retrieves a list of GUIDs that signify which pixel formats the converter supports.
member.param: The size of the pPixelFormatGUIDs array.
Pointer to a GUID array that receives the pixel formats the converter supports.
The actual array size needed to retrieve all pixel formats supported by the converter.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICFormatConverterInfo
member.summary: Exposes methods that provide information about a pixel format converter.
